refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
If subclassed, Nemo will request a list of Nemo.Column objects, which are then displayed when the user is in List mode.
An extension sub-classing Nemo.ColumnProvider will almost always want to sub-class Nemo.InfoProvider as well, since that is how an extension provides information for each item in a directory listing.

example.title: Nemo.ColumnProvider Example

refsect2.title: Nemo.ColumnProvider.get_columns
refsect2.para: The get_columns() method returns a list of Nemo.Column.
